About Me

Hi! I’m Rutuja, a Full Stack Developer who loves turning ideas into real-world solutions. I build robust backends with Python and Django, pair them with sleek frontends using Angular, and sprinkle in SQL for data management. When I’m not coding, I use Power BI to transform raw data into visual stories. Currently seeking roles where I can create impactful tools—whether that’s backend systems, full-stack apps, or data-driven insights. Let’s build something meaningful!
